main event: A witness observed a bright white light in the sky that changed appearance and intensified before dimming again.
interesting points: The light was initially seen as stationary and then transformed into multiple lights,The object was described to be approximately the size of a baseball or grapefruit,The object moved at an estimated speed of 350 to 450 mph,The observation lasted between 5 to 10 minutes,The witness noted that the object disappeared behind trees after moving away.
sighted object: a bright white light that transformed into multiple lights
